question: Any vague idea of the kind of career you'd like to pursue? (optional)
What is a subject/an activity you are passionate about? (if any)
What are some courses taken/skills related to your career that you have already learnt? (if any)
Which one do you enjoy more:
Which of the following do you enjoy doing the most?
options: a. Analyzing data and solving complex problems
b. Creating or designing something new
d. Expressing yourself through art or writing

question: Which of the following would be your ideal job perk?
options: a. High salary and job security
b. Flexible schedule and work-life balance
c. Opportunities for career advancement and growth
d. Making a positive impact on others or the world

question: Do you like working with technology?
Any other thing you would like us to know?
